---
title: "Country Analysis"
---

This page tracks changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population over time for a single country (United States).

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

country_name = "United States"
c = df[df["country"] == country_name].sort_values("year")

fig = px.line(
    c,
    x="year",
    y=["life_expectancy", "gdp_per_capita", "population_millions"],
    markers=True,
    labels={
        "value": "Value",
        "variable": "Metric",
        "year": "Year"
    },
    title=f"{country_name}: Life Expectancy, GDP per Capita, and Population Over Time"
)
fig
